_sText:
bhop_scrollmore is a linear map for EZ-Mode/auto, ironic!

no multi triggers, the fastest hopper wins.

the pink blocks designate the pathway for the normal timer
the turquoise blocks signify the bonus route possibilities

the green block area is the start zone and the red being the end zone.

while making this map i kept in mind the open style of very old bhop maps, open skybox, its just something I wanted to incorporate into a newer modern style looking map

map created by Jakeâ„¢ #usa however this pingpong2012 is an account I made here a very long time ago. auto on ;)
